campaign_bonus_value_ids_unit_sets.notes: Percentage modifier for unit stat ammo mod. Applied to unit stats, can come from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Percentage modifier for unit stat armour. Applied to unit stats, can come from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive bonus for charge damage, used for character bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Added to unit stat m_charge_bonus. Applied to unit stats, can come from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Added to unit stat m_charge_speed. Applied to unit stats. Increases unit charge speed when under certain range to target
Percentage modifier to unit cost. Used from province and sea-region bonuses when recruiting
Additive bonus for damage vs large entities, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Sets inspiration_range_bonus for unit. Applied to unit stats, can come from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive modifier to unit morale for units within a generals aura. Used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Increases overall charge damage for units
Multiplied to melee attack interval stat. Used from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Added to melee attack stat. Used from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive bonus for melee ap damage, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Multiplicative bonus for melee ap damage, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive bonus for melee damage, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Multiplicative bonus for melee damage, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Added to melee defence stat (m_melee_defence). Used from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Percentage modifier on miscast chance. Used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Added to missile block chance stat. Used from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Multiplicative bonus for missile ap damage, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Multiplicative bonus for missile damage, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.

Percentage modifier that affects unit stat m_base_speed_scalar_modifier. Positive value increases this stat. Applied to unit stats, can come from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Increase unit morale. Used from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Percentage modifier to unit action points. Positive value increases action points. Used at military force bonuses.
Modifier for range in unit stats. Used from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Added to recruitment time for units. Used from province and sea-region bonuses when recruiting.
Modifier for reload in unit stats. Used from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Percentage modifier for unit replenishment. Used from military force bonuses, generals, faction, retinues
Percentage modifier for unit replenishment. Used from military force bonuses, generals, faction, retinues
Percentage modifier for unit replenishment. Used from military force bonuses, generals, faction, retinues
Percentage modifier for unit replenishment. Used from military force bonuses, generals, faction, retinues
Percentage modifier for unit replenishment. Used from military force bonuses, generals, faction, retinues
Percentage modifier for unit replenishment. Used from military force bonuses, generals, faction, retinues
Percentage modifier for unit replenishment. Used from military force bonuses, generals, faction, retinues
Percentage modifier for unit replenishment. Used from military force bonuses, generals, faction, retinues
Percentage modifier for ship health. Used from force or character bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Percentage modifier for ship ramming damage. Used from force or character bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive modifier to unit splash attack multiplier. Used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Adds to unit stat m_unit_training_level (clamped at maximum allowed). Applied to unit stats, can come from force's or unit-commanding character's bonuses.
Modifies faction unit cap for this unit. Used at faction bonuses.
Additive bonus for all damage resistance, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive bonus for flame damage resistance, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive bonus for magic damage resistance, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive bonus for missile damage resistance, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive bonus for physical damage resistance, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Percentage modifier unit fatigue restistance. Negative values increase resistance. Used at military force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Additive bonus for flaming attack damage, used at character and force bonuses. Can be used with unit xp range.
Unit starting fatigue state. Used as a max value (does not stack). 0 = fresh, 5 = exhausted. Used at military force bonuses.
Added to recruitment XP for units. Used from province and sea-region bonuses when recruiting
Percentage modifier for unit upkeep. Used from military force, faction, character, force retinue bonuses.
Accumulated across all sources and then modified by sinusoidal function before being added to capacity of vampiric mercenary pools.
Accumulated across all sources and then modified by sinusoidal function before being added to replenishment rate of vampiric mercenary pools.
